公儀: (こうぎ) - imperial court; shogunate government; authorities; public affairs; official; government
公公然: (こうこうぜん) - very much out in the open (as in a information)
公共: (こうきょう) - public; community; public service; society; communal
公共の福祉: (こうきょうのふくし) - public welfare
公共事業: (こうきょうじぎょう) - public works; public-works projects; public utilities
公共事業費: (こうきょうじぎょうひ) - public-works spending
公共交通機関: (こうきょうこうつうきかん) - public transportation
公共企業体: (こうきょうきぎょうたい) - public or government corporation
公共企業体等労働関係法: (こうきょうきぎょうたいとうろうどうかんけいほう) - Public Corporation and Government Enterprise Labor Relations Law
公共哲学: (こうきょうてつがく) - public philosophy
公共団体: (こうきょうだんたい) - public organization; public organisation
公共図書館: (こうきょうとしょかん) - public library
公共圏: (こうきょうけん) - public sphere; public domain
公共土木事業: (こうきょうどぼくじぎょう) - public works
公共土木施設災害復旧事業費国庫負担法: (こうきょうどぼくしせつさいがいふっきゅうじぎょうひこっこふたんほう) - National Government Defrayment Act for Reconstruction of Disaster-Stricken Public Facilities
公共工事: (こうきょうこうじ) - public works
公共性: (こうきょうせい) - publicness (degree to which a particular action will affect society as large); public nature; commonality
公共投資: (こうきょうとうし) - public investment
公共支出: (こうきょうししゅつ) - public expenditure; public outlay; public spending
公共放送: (こうきょうほうそう) - public broadcasting (e.g. NHK, BBC)
公共料金: (こうきょうりょうきん) - public utilities charge
公共施設: (こうきょうしせつ) - public facilities; utilities
公共施設管理公社: (こうきょうしせつかんりこうしゃ) - public corporation set up to administer a public facility
公共施設管理者: (こうきょうしせつかんりしゃ) - administrator (manager) of a public facility
公共機関: (こうきょうきかん) - public agency; public institution
公共物汚損: (こうきょうぶつおそん) - vandalism
公共組合: (こうきょうくみあい) - public partnership
公共職業安定所: (こうきょうしょくぎょうあんていじょ) - (n-pr)  Public Employment Security Office; PESO
公共財: (こうきょうざい) - public goods (i.e. goods or services such as lighthouses, military installations, etc., which are provided by government)
公共部門: (こうきょうぶもん) - public sector
公判調査: (こうはんちょうさ) - trial record
公助: (こうじょ) - rescue and assistance (by public bodies) (e.g. in time of disaster)
公労協: (こうろうきょう) - Council of the Public Corporations and Government Workers Unions
公労委: (こうろうい) - Public Corporation and National Enterprise Labor Relations Commission
公労法: (こうろうほう) - Public Corporations and Government Enterprises Labor Relations Act
公務員: (こうむいん) - government worker; public servant; civil servant
公務員研修所: (こうむいんけんしゅうじょ) - training institute for civil servants
公務員管理職: (こうむいんかんりしょく) - executive positions in the civil service
公務員試験: (こうむいんしけん) - civil service examination
公務執行妨害: (こうむしっこうぼうがい) - interference with a public servant in the execution of his or her duties
公務災害: (こうむさいがい) - accidents in line of duty
公務疾病: (こうむしっぺい) - sickness incurred in line of duty
公募: (こうぼ) - public appeal (e.g. for contributions); public offering (of securities); public advertisement (of a post); open recruitment
公募割れ: (こうぼわれ) - trade below the public offering price during a float
公募株: (こうぼかぶ) - publicly subscribed shares or stock
公卿: (くげ) - court noble/nobility; (こうけい only) three lords and nine ministers (of the ancient Chinese government)
公同書簡: (こうどうしょかん) - General Epistles (James, Peter, Jude, John); Catholic Epistles; General Letters
公告: (こうこく) - public announcement; official notice
公営ギャンブル: (こうえいギャンブル) - public (i.e. government-operated) gambling
公営企業: (こうえいきぎょう) - public enterprise
公営住宅: (こうえいじゅうたく) - public housing
公営競技: (こうえいきょうぎ) - government-controlled competitive sports, for which government-operated gambling is allowed
公団: (こうだん) - public corporation; public housing
公団住宅: (こうだんじゅうたく) - public housing
公園デビュー: (こうえんデビュー) - bringing one's child to the local park to play for the first time
公地: (こうち) - (ant: 私地) public land; government land
公地公民: (こうちこうみん) - complete state ownership of land and citizens (proclaimed by the Taika reforms) (Ritsuryo period)
公売: (こうばい) - public sale; public auction
公妃: (こうひ) - noble's consort; consort of a prince; consort of a duke; duchess; princess
公娼: (こうしょう) - licensed prostitution; registered prostitute
公娼全廃: (こうしょうぜんぱい) - abolition of licensed prostitution
公孫樹: (イチョウ) - ginkgo (Ginkgo biloba); gingko; maidenhair tree
公安: (こうあん) - public safety; public welfare
公安委員会: (こうあんいいんかい) - public safety commission
公安審査委員会: (こうあんしんさいいんかい) - Public Security Examination Commission
公安調査庁: (こうあんちょうさちょう) - (Japanese) Public Security Intelligence Agency
公安警察: (こうあんけいさつ) - security police
公定価: (こうていか) - ceiling or fixed price
公定価格: (こうていかかく) - ceiling or fixed price
公定割引率: (こうていわりびきりつ) - official discount rate
公定地価: (こうていちか) - assessed value of land
